message_1: Calculate the SHA-256 hash of the message "Hello World".
message_2:
To calculate the SHA-256 hash of the message "Hello World", we can use a programming language or an online tool. Here, I'll provide a Python code to do the calculation:

```python
import hashlib

message = "Hello World"
hash_object = hashlib.sha256(message.encode())
hash_hex = hash_object.hexdigest()

print(hash_hex)
```

When you run this code, you'll get the following SHA-256 hash:

`64ec88ca00b268e5ba1a35678a1b5316d212f4f366b2477232534a8aeca37f3c`
